summary: A near retired inspector and his unit are willing to put down a crime boss at all costs while dealing with his replacement, who is getting in their way. Meanwhile, the crime boss sends his top henchmen to put an end to their dirty schemes.
cast: Donnie Yen|Simon Yam|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Jing Wu|Kai Chi Liu|Danny Summer|Ken Chang|Austin Wai|Timmy Hung|Tat Chi Chan|Jingke Liang|Vincent Sze|Kenji Tanigaki|Ching-Lam Lau|Maggie Poon|Kin Leung Yuen|Chris Tsui|Tung So|Hin-Wai Au|Jeffrey Wan-Chung Lam|Hua Yan
director: Director: Wilson Yip (as Yip Wai Shun)
title: Duelo de dragones
